search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Katana (katana-mrp.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: You can find the official pricing page for Katana at https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
Pricing — Katana
===============

[Skip to content](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#site-content)

[![Image 13](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/katana-logo3.svg)](https://katanamrp.com/ "Katana")

Main
----

*   Features Back
    
    Features
    --------
    
    *   [Real-time inventory](https://katanamrp.com/features/real-time-inventory/) Get live insights into inventory and end-to-end traceability
        
    *   [Purchase management](https://katanamrp.com/features/purchasing/) Issue POs, manage contract manufacturing, and set reorder points
        
    *   [Sales order management](https://katanamrp.com/features/omnichannel-sales/) View all sales data, partially fulfill orders and access sales insights
        
    *   [Planning and forecasting](https://katanamrp.com/features/planning-and-forecasting/) Improve inventory planning with data-driven forecasts and replenishment
        
    *   [Production management](https://katanamrp.com/features/production-management/) Automatic resource allocation with the real-time master planner
        
    *   [Cloud accounting](https://katanamrp.com/features/financial-visibility/) Keep your inventory and accounting data in sync for accurate costing
        
    *   [Warehouse management](https://katanamrp.com/features/warehouse-management/) Streamline stocktakes, optimize workflows with barcode scanning and bin locations
        
    *   [See all features](https://katanamrp.com/features/) Features for complete inventory control
        
    
    [Why choose Katana](https://katanamrp.com/why-katana/)
    
    Integrations
    ------------
    
    *   [![Image 14](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/icon-shopify.png)Shopify](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/shopify/)
    *   [![Image 15](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/icon-woocommerce.png)WooCommerce](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/woocommerce/)
    *   [![Image 16](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/icon-bigcommerce.png)BigCommerce](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/bigcommerce/)
    *   [![Image 17](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/icon-quickbooks.png)QuickBooks Online](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/quickbooks/)
    *   [![Image 18](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Hubspot.svg)HubSpot](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/hubspot/)
    *   [![Image 19](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/logo-xero.svg)Xero](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/xero/)
    
    [Katana integrations](https://katanamrp.com/integrations/)
    
*   Use cases Back
    
    Use cases
    ---------
    
    *   [Tariff management](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/tariff-management/) Accurately apply tariff costs across products and protect your profit margins
        
    *   [Inventory management](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/inventory-management/) End-to-end visibility of raw materials and finished goods
        
    *   [Ecommerce](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/ecommerce/) Seamless integration with the best ecommerce platforms
        
    *   [Accounting firm](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/accounting/) Accurate cost tracking and seamless integration with accounting software
        
    *   [Retail](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/retail/) Live inventory management for online and offline retail locations
        
    *   [Omnichannel](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/omnichannel/) Centralized inventory and order tracking across all your sales channels
        
    *   [Manufacturing](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/manufacturing/) Real-time overview of your entire manufacturing process
        
    *   [Agencies and consultants](https://katanamrp.com/use-cases/agency/) Streamline inventory and production management for your clients
        
    
    [Why choose Katana](https://katanamrp.com/why-katana/)
    
    Industries
    ----------
    
    *   [![Image 20](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/check-line.svg)Apparel](https://katanamrp.com/industries/apparel-inventory-software/)
    *   [![Image 21](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/check-line.svg)Cosmetics](https://katanamrp.com/industries/cosmetics-inventory-software/)

Find the right plan for your needs
==================================

All our plans come with **unlimited users, SKUs, and integrations**

Starter
-------

For small businesses that only need a simple and scalable solution to manage their inventory, without all the bells and whistles

****$179**** / month, billed annually

$199 /month, billed quarterly

[Get a demo](https://katanamrp.com/talk-to-sales/)

*   **Core features:**
    *   Unlimited users
    *   Unlimited integrations
    *   Unlimited SKU’s

* * *

*   **1** inventory location

[View all features](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#my-comparison-table)

[View all features](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#starter)

Standard
--------

For growing businesses with multiple inventory locations, large teams, and a need for advanced inventory management

****$359**** / month, billed annually

$399 /month, billed quarterly

[Get a demo](https://katanamrp.com/talk-to-sales/)

*   **All Starter features and:**
    *   Advanced insights
    *   Multicurrency support
    *   Custom user permissions
    *   Barcode scanning

* * *

*   **3** inventory locations

[View all features](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#my-comparison-table)

[View all features](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#standard)

Popular

Professional
------------

For established companies that need a robust solution that offers further customization and more complex workflows

****$799**** / month, billed annually

$899 /month, billed quarterly

[Get a demo](https://katanamrp.com/talk-to-sales/)

*   **All Standard features and:**
    *   Access to Katana’s API
    *   Full traceability
    *   Planning and forecasting
    *   Warehouse management

* * *

*   **10** inventory locations

[View all features](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#my-comparison-table)

[View all features](https://www.katanamrp.com/pricing#professional)

![Image 34](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Katana_Professional_Plus_Fix.svg)

Professional Plus
-----------------

This plan is perfect for large-scale companies. Get unlimited inventory locations, unlimited integrations, a dedicated account manager, and more from $1799 monthly.

[Talk with sales](https://katanamrp.com/talk-to-sales/)

Annually voted best-in-class by both customers and partners

### **Order management**

Sales and purchase order management

Centralize all your sales orders and issue purchase orders directly from Katana

Selling services

Manage and sell products and services seamlessly in one workflow

Contact management

Manage customer and supplier data, such as contact information, shipping and billing addresses, and more

Added costs

Assign and track additional costs on purchase orders for better financial control and precise landed cost calculations.

Basic manufacturing

Create manufacturing orders and track progress and costs

Multicurrency support

Sell and purchase in multiple currencies with automatic daily currency conversion in Katana

Kits and bundles

Manage and sell bundled products effortlessly with automated inventory tracking, production management, and real-time stock syncing

Price lists

Set and manage customer-specific pricing, generate revenue, and keep customers happy with Price lists.

Advanced manufacturing

Access Katana’s Shop Floor App, manufacturing routings, and manufacturing insights

$199 / mo

$999 / mo

### **Inventory management**

Items management

Manage item information like categories, variants, variant codes / SKUs, sales and purchase prices, and more

Barcode scanning

Receive items, perform stocktakes, and consume materials and batches using a barcode scanner or a smartphone

Full traceability

### Full traceability

Add-on

Ensure end-to-end traceability of your products – trace items in batches or by serial numbers

*   **Serial numbers** – track your products via a unique identifier to ensure complete traceability of every product’s history and assist you in warranty device support and recall cases.
*   **Batch numbers** – assign batch or lot numbers to purchased and manufactured items and assign expiration dates to batches to gain further control over the shelf life of your items

**$199** / month

![Image 49](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/planning-and-forecasting.png)

### Planning and forecas**ting**

Add-on

Lift your cashflow and avoid stockouts and overstock with real-time inventory planning and forecasting toolset

*   **Demand planning and forecasting** — Utilize historical data to proactively order and restock items, prevent stockouts, and minimize overstock.​
*   **Replenishment planning** — Gain accurate replenishment recommendations, based on real-time demand and sales forecast.
*   **Flexible inventory control** — Set default lead times and minimum order quantities for each product and material.

**$199** / month

![Image 50](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/advanced-manufacturing-800x450.png)

### Advanced manufacturing

Add-on

Track, schedule and report the progress of your manufacturing operations

*   **Katana’s Shop Floor app for tracking shop floor operations** — Create operators and assign manufacturing tasks to track their progress in real time.
*   **Manufacturing routings** — Set up manufacturing operations in sequence (consecutive or parallel).
*   **Manufacturing insights** — Analyze manufacturing costs, resource and materials usage.

**From $199\*** / month

\*Pricing depends on your plan

![Image 51](https://katanamrp.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/warehouse-800x450.png)

### Warehouse management

Add-on

Gain stock visibility inside warehouses and simplify daily operator tasks

*   **Planning sales order fulfillment** — Use a mobile app to optimize your order fulfillment process by assigning tasks to warehouse operators and getting live updates from the warehouse. ​
*   **Picking and packing sales orders with a mobile device** — Pick and pack on the go with the Warehouse App.​
*   **Receiving goods with a mobile device** — receive goods from purchase orders on the go. 
*   **Barcode scanning** — Unlock speed and accuracy in picking stock by scanning products and material barcodes.​
*   **Bin locations** — Assign default storage bins to items and organize your warehouses to make finding item locations or destinations effortless.

**$199** / month

Dedicated support and specialized onboarding services
-----------------------------------------------------

Learn about the fastest and most efficient ways to get the most out of Katana’s capabilities through a specialized onboarding process that focuses on the needs of your company.

### Help is there when you need it

Get all the help you need to align your business operations with Katana’s workflows — our global customer experience team works around the clock to support you.

*   Live chat support
*   Comprehensive Knowledge Base
*   Customer success teams based in North America, Europe, and New Zealand will answer your questions any time of day

### Personalized onboarding plan for your business

Discover the fastest and most efficient approach to fully leverage Katana’s capabilities through our specialized onboarding services.

Customers enrolled in our onboarding programs get set up 2 to 3 times faster, and are twice as likely to achieve sustained long-term success.

[Learn more](https://katanamrp.com/onboarding-overview/)

### Frequently asked questions

##### How do the sales order and GMV limit calculations work?

Each plan (Starter, Standard, Professional, and Professional Plus) offers a different usage limit, which is measured by both:

*   The number of Sales orders marked as **Delivered**
*   The gross merchandise value (GMV) of **Delivered sales orders**

Plan prices are stated in annual terms, but pricing limits are actually calculated based on monthly usage in equal bundles over the past three months. This means if your sales orders _or_ GMV exceed the monthly limit for **three consecutive months**, your account is automatically upgraded to a higher plan. Usage is calculated based on the past calendar month.

See [this article](https://support.katanamrp.com/en/articles/8769527-understanding-the-core-limits-for-katana-plans) for more information and example calculations.

##### Can I cancel and change my subscription at any time?

Yes, you can upgrade or cancel your subscription at any time.

Downgrading is possible when the sales order and GMV consumption are within the lower plan’s limits during the past three consecutive months. Please get in touch with our customer support for more details about downgrading.

##### I have short periods of high sales volumes — can I downgrade during the low-volume periods?

While plan prices are stated in annual terms, pricing limits are actually calculated based on monthly consumption in equal bundles over the past three months. This means that if your sales orders _or_ GMV exceed the monthly limit for **three consecutive months**, your account is automatically upgraded to a higher plan. Limits are calculated based on the past calendar month to the beginning of the next month.

If you exceed sales order or GMV limits for two consecutive months but stay within the limits on the third month, your account will not be upgraded to a higher tier plan.

See [this article](https://support.katanamrp.com/en/articles/8769527-understanding-the-core-limits-for-katana-plans) for more information and example calculations.[](https://katanamrp.com/pricing/#)

##### Why do I need an onboarding package when starting Standard and higher plans?

Katana’s Standard, Professional, and Professional Plus plans are designed for growing and large-scale businesses with complex inventory management requirements.

Businesses that use Katana’s implementation are fully set up 2-3 times faster than those who set up on their own, and they are twice as likely to succeed in the long term. Our onboarding services come with a one-time fee and ensure that you get the most value from Katana — and get set up quickly and correctly.

[Learn more about our onboarding services](https://katanamrp.com/onboarding-overview/).

##### Why does the Advanced Manufacturing add-on get more expensive with higher-tier plans?

The Advanced Manufacturing add-on varies in price with our different plans because of the direct correlation between plan tier and expected usage. As you move to a higher-tier plan, it’s designed to support larger operations, which typically involve higher volumes of manufacturing processes, more complex operations, and a greater demand for data processing resources.

Tailored to suit the specific needs of your manufacturing business. Our options and pricing plans are suited to scale with the growth of your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is structured into four tiers with increasing features and capabilities. Annual billing offers a discount compared to quarterly billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For small businesses that only need a simple and scalable solution to manage their inventory.
For growing businesses with multiple inventory locations, large teams, and a need for advanced inventory management.
For established companies that need a robust solution that offers further customization and more complex workflows.
For large-scale companies needing unlimited inventory locations and dedicated support.

additional_fees.fee_description: Mandatory onboarding fee for Standard, Professional, and Professional Plus plans.
